DOC.brief_summary: The Investigational Weight Management Clinic University Michigan create identify strategy result cost-effective , long term weight management overweight obese individual . The driving hypothesis clinic 'one size fit ' philosophy untenable complex disease obesity . The clinic serve portal patient choose standard clinical care explore alternative variety clinical study offer clinic . These study include investigation nutrition , biological basis weight weight management protocol use approve experimental pharmaceutical .
DOC.brief_title: Identification Phenotypic Factors That Predict Success Weight Loss Long-term Weight Maintenance
DOC.criteria: Obese male female : age > 20 year ; Obese population define BMI > = 27 kg/m2 Lean population BMI < 27 > 17 kg/m2 Able willing provide write informed consent trial Evidence inherit disorder lipid metabolism . History Cancer within last 5 year Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) antibody positive . Patients solid organ transplant . Participation clinical trial within 90 day entry trial . Pregnant lactating female . Uncontrolled thyroid disease Unstable angina NY heart association class II failure Gastrointestinal disease specifically GI motility disorder Unstable neuropsychiatric disease include major depression/anxiety , eat disorder binge eating , bulimia anorexia End stage renal hepatic disease Autoimmune disorder ( e.g . SLE ) Body weight fluctuation 5 kg previous 3 month Prior bariatric surgery A history current alcohol/substance abuse change smoke habit cessation past 6 month . Women childbearing age must use reliable form contraception . Any medical condition , opinion investigator would make patient unsuitable recruitment , could interfere patient participate complete protocol . Unwilling unable consent study .
